content: quote: An Austrian woman called police to report that she was mugged … by a bald eagle. Klara Maier told police she couldn’t believe her eyes when the eagle, with its 7 foot wingspan, swooped down and grabber her pocketbook out of her hand, Ananova reported. The 69-year-old Kundl resident said the bird landed in the street with the bag before opening it and looking through its contents. The bird later was found hiding in a field. Police said it had escaped from its owner, who had trained it by keeping food in a bag similiar in shape and color to Maier’s. (....) The (petrified) look on her face must have been priceless. +http://blogs.app.com/saywhat/2009/04/22/eagle-mugs-woman-takes-purse/ "None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free." -Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
